landingInformation: Welcome to my portfolio. My name is Richard and I am a student at FIIT Slovak Technical University. It's been more than 5 years since I first got acquainted with programming. Until recently, I spent most of my time as a semi-professional athlete. I devote my free time to education or gaining new experiences.

workInformation.title: My preferences
workInformation.description: I prefer to work with OOP programming languages and I focus my general overview on web-development. In web development, I mainly focus on the backend. I can also make a frontend, but I don't consider myself a designer, so the frontend process takes longer for me.

workInformation.title: Work experience
workInformation.description: During the last two semesters, I worked in Slovaneta as an intern. We worked on the internal Odoo system where I developed customized modules. During the semester, I also spent my time with an extension project focused on SEO. In my spare time, I worked on various projects of my own, or helped friends with their websites.

workInformation.title: Current knowledge
workInformation.description: Currently, I know languages such as Python, Javascript, C and descriptive languages html, css, xml. I also have experience with frameworks such as FLask, Django, React, Bootstrap, Tailwind. In projects, I also encountered project containerization, specifically Docker.

interestInformation.title: My main objective
interestInformation.description: My main goal is to improve in my field. I improve my personal growth not only by working on assignments, but I try to follow and learn good habits from more experienced Engineers.

interestInformation.title: Work environment
interestInformation.description: I have been involved in social sports since a young age, so working in a team is not a problem for me. I am able to quickly adapt to a new work environment and I am not ashamed to ask questions to which I do not know the answer.

interestInformation.title: Work under stress
interestInformation.description: I always try to submit the task I am working on by the deadline and complete it 100%. Working under stress is not pleasant, but it's also nothing I can't handle. I divide my responsibilities so that I have no problem completing them.

cardsOne.title: A little about me
cardsOne.description: Hello, my name is Richard. I am a 21-year-old student of the Slovak Technical University. I like to learn new skills and acquire new knowledge. I am able to adapt to work environments from different fields. I worked on a construction site, as a waiter or worked as a programmer in Slovaneta.

cardsOne.title: From sports to informatics
cardsOne.description: My interest in computer science started when I was 17 years old. I came across the 3D modeling software Blender while watching a video about games. I didn't write code in Blender, but I became interested in the process of creating games. I started learning the C# programming language and discovered the Unity software. This led me to create a game called 'Mark Ball' which is available for download on the Google Play Store.

cardsOne.title: Why I chose to study computer science
cardsOne.description: I chose to study computer science and technology because I have a passion for this field. I am interested in the process of creating software, websites and other computer resources. What I enjoy about this field is that it is enough to learn logical patterns and procedures, which I can then use to create complex projects.

cardsTwo.title: Education
cardsTwo.description: As a child, I attended Tilgnerova elementary school. Later, I transferred to St. Uršula Primary School. After elementary school, I decided to focus my education on sports. At the Secondary Sports School in Ružinov, I graduated from compulsory subjects, English, coaching, mathematics. I also graduated from computer science as an additional optional subject. Subsequently, I entered STU FIIT, which I wanted to enter since the third year of high school.

cardsTwo.title: Early experiences
cardsTwo.description: In high school, I became a bit more interested in computer science. At that time I was studying the Python programming language and working on several projects. I used Flask and learned basic web technologies like HTML and CSS and experimented with different frameworks.

cardsTwo.title: My latest experience
cardsTwo.description: During the first year at the university, I gained a lot of new knowledge from practice as well as theoretical information. For example, we learned how larger projects are created, we delved deeper into OOP and the more abstract parts of larger projects. What I learned at school, I could see in the company where I worked. I got my experience in python where I first encountered xml. During school we worked on several projects where we used C, JavaScript, Shell Scripting and I worked with one lecturer on an additional project focused on SEO.

sub_projects.title: Procedurálne programovanie C
sub_projects.context: Ako už vieme jazyk C je základom veľa iných programovacích jazykov. Po prvý krát som sa stretol s týmto jazykom na vysokej škole, a venujem sa mu už vyše dvoch rokov. Pravidelne tomuto jazyku boli venované cvičenia či projekty.
sub_projects.note: Nadobudol som: Základy programovania, Alokácia, Linked listy, Bitové operácie

sub_projects.title: Odoo ERP
sub_projects.context: Na mojej prvej oficiálnej pracovnej pozící som pracoval s Enterprise systémom Odoo, kde sme vytvárali moduli na mieru. Pracoval na vývoji modulu, ktorý sledoval zmeny u zamestnancov ako napríklad odchod na materskú, zmena pracovnej pozície a podobne.
sub_projects.note: Myslím si že ma to osobne posunulu, stretol som sa tu s technológiami ako Docker, zlepšil som svoje skúsenosti s pythonom, pracoval som s databázou, pozoroval som ako fungujú IT tímy v praxi.

sub_projects.title: Flask aplikácia
sub_projects.context: Webová stránka predstavuju blog. Táto aplikácia spĺňala 4 základné operácie CRUD. Na stránke som vytváral aj základné šifrovania údajov ako sha-256.

sub_projects.title: Django aplikácia
sub_projects.context: Táto aplikácia slúži ako jednoduchý a flexibilný systém pre objednávky zadané priamo používateľom. Momentálne na tejto aplikácií pracujem.

sub_projects.title: Webová hra
sub_projects.context: Počas druhého semestra sme pracovali na webovej hre za pomoci javvascriptu. Projekt je organizovaný pomocou formule MVC, obsahuje contstructy, dedenie a ďalšie kritéria. UI je vytvorený pomocou canvasu. Podrobnejší popis kritérií a dokumentáciu ku projektu sa dočítate na mojom githube.
sub_projects.note: Pri tomto projekte som sa naučil nový OOP jazyk a jeho hlavné charakteristiky.

sub_projects.title: React portfólio
sub_projects.context: Portfólio na ktorom sa momentálne nachádzate je vytvorené za pomoci reactu. Tento projekt je kontajnerizovaný a obsahuje aj inštrukcie ako spustit projekt lokálne pomocou programu Docker.

sub_projects.title: MERN Aplikácia
sub_projects.context: Tento projekt som si rozpracoval v priebehu letu, no nemal som dostatok času. K tomuto projekt sa plánujem vrátiť v najbližšej dobe.

sub_projects.title: Mobilná hra
sub_projects.context: Hru by som zaradil do kategórie Indie, kde hráč musí prejsť niekoľko levelov bez kolízie do iných objektov. Hru som následne pridal na google store kde je stále dostupná na stiahnutie. Jazyk C# momentálne neovládam a ani sa mu aktívne nevenujem.

future_introduction: You can read about the projects I am currently working on or what I plan to do in the future. You can switch the article by clicking on the link or typing the appropriate command. You activate the command line by clicking the cursor.
future_command_help: Displays system chosen article of projects that are being worked on or that are planned to be done in the future
future_error_msg: Your input is spelled wrongly! Only possible option is article -[type]

future.title: Mern aplication
future.command_des: You will read a text describing an application based on the MERN tech stack.
future.description: This project should be completed within one to two years. In the final result, it should be an application for catering businesses that will simplify the organization of the team in the restaurant. It will also be usable for people who will be able to order food or reserve a table. The application is mainly based on the MERN tech stack, which means Mongo database, Express js for the backend, React for the frontend, and the entire application runs with the help of node js. I use various external software during creation, but the mentioned technologies are the basis.

future.title: Blog
future.command_des: An article about a planned blog project will appear.
future.description: The main purpose of the blog is to expand your knowledge of languages, to gain experience in leading a team and to review topics covered in school. In the blog, I would like to use the materials provided by the Faculty and explore the topics covered more deeply, about which I would subsequently write articles. The articles will also be written in foreign languages, which would improve my vocabulary and strengthen the basics of foreign languages.

future.title: Education for the future
future.command_des: The article will explain what I want to focus on in the future
future.description: In the future, I plan to learn to speak at least one more foreign language fluently. I would like to direct my education mainly to the innovative part of informatics such as AI, ML and the like. My goal is to help people simplify their work.

contact_description: If you are interested in my portfolio, do not hesitate to contact me via email richard3.nemeth@gmail.com. I will be happy to answer your questions or help you with your project.

project_intro.context: Môžete sa dočítať podrobnejšie informácie o mojich projektoch a skúsenostiach.
